text: He wong kang padha nguwasani bandhane bocah sakpepadhane, bocah kang padha ngebreh bandhane, aja sira wenehake, kersane Allah bandha mau dicekelake sira kanggo ngopeni bocah mau. Sira padha ngingonana lan sira padha nyandangana bocah mau kelawan bandhane. Lan sira padha nandukna tembung manis tur kepenak marang bocah mau
